titles.title: To impose a tax and import controls on bullets expressly designated to penetrate law enforcement personnel bulletproof vests.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 1/11/1995--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to impose an excise tax on the making of ammunition designed to penetrate bulletproof vests. Describes such ammunition as that determined to be expressly manufactured or advertised to penetrate such vests worn by law enforcement personnel.
